channel.title: Software on nuaNce's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software on nuaNce's blog

item.title: Some of My Favorite Software
item.description: This is a list of some of the best software that I have come across in my journey using Linux. I highly recommend that you try them out and maybe even give the developers a well earned star on Github to show your support :) Links to the software’s Github page are in the headers Maim, the better screenshot tool One of the most important pieces of software you can have is something to capture you display, while scrot does the job quite well, it has issues with selecting areas and windows, which is where Maim comes in, it does basically the same thing as scrot but without any of the rendering and selection issues.
